articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Thousands gather in Srebrenica on 30th anniversary of Europe's only acknowledged genocide since WWII - NBC News
articles.description: Thousands of people from Bosnia and around the world gathered in Srebrenica to mark the 30th anniversary of a 1995 massacre of more than 8,000 boys and men.
articles.content: Thousands of people from Bosnia and around the world gathered in Srebrenica to mark the 30th anniversary of a 1995 massacre there of more than 8,000 Bosniak Muslim boys and men, which has been acknow… [+3204 chars]
